messages.content: ComfyUI-TrackingNodes is a set of custom nodes for ComfyUI that allows tracking objects in videos using YOLOv8.
To install ComfyUI-TrackingNodes, clone or download the repo into your `ComfyUI/custom_nodes/` directory and run `pip install -r requirements.txt` within the cloned repo.
How can I configure models for ComfyUI-TrackingNodes?

To configure models for ComfyUI-TrackingNodes, download one of the YOLOv8 models from https://github.com/ultralytics/ultralytics and place it into `ComfyUI/custom_nodes/ComfyUI-TrackingNodes/models/yolov8`.
Are there any accompanying node repositories for ComfyUI-TrackingNodes?

Yes, there are two accompanying node repositories for ComfyUI-TrackingNodes: InstanceDiffusion (https://github.com/logtd/ComfyUI-InstanceDiffusion) and AnimateDiff-Evolved (https://github.com/Kosinkadink/ComfyUI-AnimateDiff-Evolved).
